description.zh-cn: 中国近代结构工程师、桥梁工程专家与科普作家，被视为中国土力学的开拓者、中国近代桥梁事业的先驱，曾任全国政协副主席。
description.en: A modern Chinese structural engineer, bridge engineering expert, and science writer, considered a pioneer in soil mechanics and modern bridge engineering in China. He served as a Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 茅以升的妻子。
description.en: Spouse of Mao Yisheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Chairwoman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、军事家、外交家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: A Chinese politician, military leader, and diplomat who served as the first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国学者、记者、编辑，因提出“党天下”言论而受到批判。
description.en: A Chinese scholar, journalist, and editor who was criticized for his 'Party-state' remarks.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。他为茅以升在卡内基美隆大学的铜像题词。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the sixth Premier of the People's Republic of China. He wrote the inscription for Mao Yisheng's statue at Carnegie Mellon University.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年间在中华人民共和国发生的一场重大政治运动，期间茅以升等众多学者遭到批斗。
description.en: A major political movement in the People's Republic of China from 1966 to 1976, during which many scholars, including Mao Yisheng, were persecuted.

description.zh-cn: 指代抗日战争期间的日本军队。其向杭州的进攻是茅以升决定炸毁钱塘江大桥的直接原因。
description.en: Refers to the Japanese military during the Second Sino-Japanese War. Their advance on Hangzhou was the direct reason for Mao Yisheng's decision to demolish the Qiantang River Bridge.

description.zh-cn: 茅以升的母校之一，于1916年毕业。
description.en: One of Mao Yisheng's alma maters, from which he graduated in 1916.

description.zh-cn: 美国的一所私立研究型大学，茅以升于1917年在此获得硕士学位。
description.en: A private research university in the United States where Mao Yisheng obtained his Master's degree in 1917.

description.zh-cn: 茅以升于1921年在此获得博士学位，是该校的第一位博士。后为卡内基美隆大学的一部分。
description.en: Mao Yisheng received his PhD here in 1921, becoming the school's first-ever doctoral graduate. It later became part of Carnegie Mellon University.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国组织。
description.en: The national-level organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China.

en: Construction of the Qiantang River Bridge

description.zh-cn: 在浙江省钱塘江上修建双层公路铁路两用桥的工程项目，由茅以升主持设计和组织修建。
description.en: The engineering project to build a double-deck road and railway bridge over the Qiantang River in Zhejiang Province, with Mao Yisheng leading the design and construction.

en: Demolition of the Qiantang River Bridge

description.zh-cn: 为阻止日军攻打杭州，茅以升亲自参与炸毁钱塘江大桥的事件。
description.en: The event where Mao Yisheng personally participated in the demolition of the Qiantang River Bridge to prevent the Japanese army from attacking Hangzhou.

en: Repair of the Qiantang River Bridge

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争胜利后，由茅以升受命组织修复钱塘江大桥的工程，于1948年3月通车。
description.en: After the victory of the Second Sino-Japanese War, Mao Yisheng was tasked with organizing the repair of the Qiantang River Bridge, which reopened to traffic in March 1948.

en: Construction of the Wuhan Yangtze River Bridge

description.zh-cn: 在武汉市修建长江大桥的工程，由茅以升主持设计。
description.en: The project to build the Yangtze River Bridge in Wuhan, with Mao Yisheng leading the design.

nodes.id: 重庆石板坡长江大桥建设

zh-cn: 重庆石板坡长江大桥建设
en: Construction of the Chongqing Shibanpo Yangtze River Bridge

description.zh-cn: 在重庆市修建石板坡长江大桥的工程，由茅以升主持设计。
description.en: The project to build the Shibanpo Yangtze River Bridge in Chongqing, with Mao Yisheng leading the design.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京天安门广场西侧的建筑，是北京十大建筑之一。茅以升曾担任其结构审查组组长。
description.en: A building located on the western edge of Tiananmen Square in Beijing, one of the Ten Great Buildings. Mao Yisheng served as the head of its structural review team.

description.zh-cn: 位于江苏省的一个县，是茅以升的出生地。
description.en: A county in Jiangsu province, the birthplace of Mao Yisheng.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都，茅以升的逝世地。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, where Mao Yisheng passed away.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党，茅以升是其党员。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China, of which Mao Yisheng was a member.

description.zh-cn: 中国的民主党派之一，茅以升是其社员。
description.en: One of the democratic parties in China, of which Mao Yisheng was a member.

en: China Association for Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 中国科技工作者的群众组织，茅以升曾担任副主席和名誉主席。
description.en: A mass organization for Chinese scientists and technologists, where Mao Yisheng served as vice chairman and honorary chairman.

description.zh-cn: 茅以升于1914年与戴传蕙结婚。
description.en: Mao Yisheng married Dai Chuanhui in 1914.

position.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会副主席
position.en: Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 茅以升担任全国政协副主席期间，邓颖超是全国政协主席。
description.en: When Mao Yisheng served as Vice Chairman of the CPPCC National Committee, Deng Yingchao was the Chairwoman.

description.zh-cn: 茅以升于1896年1月9日出生于江苏省镇江府丹徒县。
description.en: Mao Yisheng was born in Dantu County, Zhenjiang Prefecture, Jiangsu Province on January 9, 1896.

description.zh-cn: 茅以升于1916年毕业于唐山工业专门学校。
description.en: Mao Yisheng graduated from Tangshan Industrial College in 1916.

description.zh-cn: 茅以升于1917年获得美国康乃尔大学硕士学位（桥梁专业）。
description.en: Mao Yisheng received a Master's degree in Bridge Engineering from Cornell University in the United States in 1917.

description.zh-cn: 茅以升于1921年获美国卡耐基理工学院博士学位，是该校的第一位博士。
description.en: Mao Yisheng obtained his PhD from the Carnegie Institute of Technology in the United States in 1921, becoming the school's first doctoral graduate.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，茅以升多次受到批斗，被戴上“反动学术权威”的牌子并被游街围攻。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Mao Yisheng was subjected to multiple struggle sessions, labeled as a 'reactionary academic authority', and publicly paraded and attacked.

description.zh-cn: 茅以升担任浙江省钱塘江桥工程处处长，主持设计并组织修建了钱塘江大桥。
description.en: Mao Yisheng served as the director of the Zhejiang Qiantang River Bridge Engineering Office, leading the design and construction of the Qiantang River Bridge.

description.zh-cn: 为阻止日军进攻，茅以升亲自参与并组织了炸毁钱塘江大桥的行动。
description.en: To halt the advance of the Japanese army, Mao Yisheng personally participated in and organized the demolition of the Qiantang River Bridge.

description.zh-cn: 日军向杭州的进攻是炸毁钱塘江大桥以进行阻滞的直接原因。
description.en: The advance of the Japanese army on Hangzhou was the direct cause for the demolition of the Qiantang River Bridge to obstruct them.

description.zh-cn: 炸毁钱塘江大桥的行动成功阻滞了日军的进攻。
description.en: The demolition of the Qiantang River Bridge successfully blocked the advance of the Japanese army.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争胜利后，茅以升受命组织修复钱塘江大桥，并于1948年3月完成通车。
description.en: After the victory of the Second Sino-Japanese War, Mao Yisheng was tasked with organizing the repair of the Qiantang River Bridge, which reopened to traffic in March 1948.

description.zh-cn: 茅以升主持设计了武汉长江大桥。
description.en: Mao Yisheng led the design of the Wuhan Yangtze River Bridge.

description.zh-cn: 在人民大会堂的建设中，周恩来总理指定茅以升为设计方案审定人。
description.en: During the construction of the Great Hall of the People, Premier Zhou Enlai appointed Mao Yisheng as the final approver of the design plan.

relationships.target: 重庆石板坡长江大桥建设

description.zh-cn: 茅以升于1977年主持设计了重庆石板坡长江大桥。
description.en: Mao Yisheng led the design of the Chongqing Shibanpo Yangtze River Bridge in 1977.

description.zh-cn: 在1957年储安平“党天下”事件时，茅以升站出来批判储的言论。
description.en: During the 1957 'Party-state' incident involving Chu Anping, Mao Yisheng stood up to criticize Chu's remarks.

description.zh-cn: 2006年，茅以升的母校卡内基美隆大学为其铜像举行落成典礼，铜像文字出自时任中国国务院总理温家宝的手笔，提升了茅以升的国际声誉。
description.en: In 2006, Mao Yisheng's alma mater, Carnegie Mellon University, held an unveiling ceremony for his bronze statue. The inscription on the statue was written by then-Chinese Premier Wen Jiabao, enhancing Mao Yisheng's international reputation.

description.zh-cn: 茅以升于1980年当选为中国科学技术协会第二届全国委员会副主席，于1986年被推举为第三届全国委员会名誉主席。
description.en: Mao Yisheng was elected as Vice Chairman of the Second National Committee of the China Association for Science and Technology in 1980, and was appointed Honorary Chairman of the Third National Committee in 1986.
